amendment.description: Amendment makes technical and conforming changes to the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 114-666 to make technical and conforming changes to the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Palmer amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
